Smart grid.Description: Smart grid utilizes renewable energy sources for efficient energy distribution.
Smart grid connects to the existing electricity grid to enable two-way communication.
Smart grid integrates energy storage systems to balance supply and demand.
Smart grid enables demand response programs to manage electricity consumption.
Smart grid utilizes smart meters for real-time monitoring and control of electricity usage.
Smart grid incorporates distributed generation technologies for decentralized power generation.
Smart grid supports the development and operation of microgrids for localized power distribution.
Smart grid utilizes data analytics to optimize energy distribution and consumption.
Smart grid ensures cybersecurity measures to protect against cyber threats.
Smart grid implements grid optimization strategies for efficient energy management.
